comments: Had to take his piano class because of scholarship. He could rarely answer my questions and was very condescending. He never remembered basic details about me, such as my major, even though I saw him for private lessons weekly. Lastly, the pianos for the non music majors are worthless, broken keys and pedals made it difficult to practice.
If you get frustrated do not give in. It will pay off in the long run.
This guy is amazing! He is the best piano teacher I\'ve ever had and gives so many cool hints and is VERY nice!
